mapper.select: select count(*) from Diligence_And_Laziness where dal_mem_number = #{mem_number}

select to_number(substr(dalview_number,4,9999999)) dalview_number, dalview_date, dalview_attend_time, dalview_off_time, dalview_content, dalview_mem_number, dalview_sf_number from DalView where dalview_mem_number = #{mem_number}
AND dalview_date like '%'||#{val}||'%'
AND dalview_content like '%'||#{val}||'%'
order by 1 desc

select * from vacation,member,vacation_policy where 1=1
and vacation_vp_number like '%'||#{val}||'%'
and vacation_mem_number = mem_number and VACATION_VP_NUMBER = VP_NUMBER and vacation_mem_number = #{mem_number} order by 1 desc
